content:
Craft an item of type: blue_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 48, "index": 10}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 57, "index": 19}, {"type": "lilac", "quantity": 37, "index": 21}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "netherite_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "bowl", "quantity": 39, "index": 33}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 35}, {"type": "painting", "quantity": 30, "index": 42}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft blue_terracotta. Blue terracotta requires placing 8 terracotta around a blue dye. I have 8 terracotta in my inventory, so I just need to craft the blue dye. I have a cornflower in my inventory which can be used to craft blue dye, so I will first move it to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: blue_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 48, "index": 10}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 57, "index": 19}, {"type": "lilac", "quantity": 37, "index": 21}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "netherite_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "bowl", "quantity": 39, "index": 33}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 35}, {"type": "painting", "quantity": 30, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can craft the blue dye by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: To craft blue_terracotta, I need to place 8 terracotta in a square and place the blue dye in the center. The first step is to move one terracotta from slot 35 to the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1
